text: Ryan Seacrest often references his girlfriend, Shayna Taylor, on Live! with Kelly and Ryan, but is the couple on the verge of a split? As Ryan Seacrest, 42, continues to joke about his future life as a married man on his morning show with Kelly Ripa, an insider claims that things between the television host and Shayna Taylor, 26, may have taken a turn for the worse just months after they relocated to New York City from Los Angeles. On September 27, Radar Online shared a report with readers, claiming that Ryan Seacrest ’ s wild life in the Big Apple may be causing a divide in his relationship.
